title: Create Weekly Staff Schedule
description: A front office manager needs to create the staff schedule for the upcoming week.

tasks.description: Review the hotel's occupancy forecast for the next week to determine staffing needs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager notes high occupancy for the weekend, requiring extra staff.

tasks.description: Check staff availability and time-off requests.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager reviews all approved time-off for the week.

tasks.description: Generate a draft schedule using the scheduling software, ensuring all shifts are covered.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete draft schedule is generated.

tasks.description: Publish the final schedule and notify the staff.
tasks.expected_outcome: The schedule is published, and staff receive a notification.
